name: A Good Time
description:
A very short Tamagotchi-like game with 3 endings. 

AGT touches on the concept of prolonging life or prolonging death in the pov of a tiny lively elderly. 

Graphic Credits: me 

Music Credits : 

🎵Music provided by BGM President
